oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-11-17 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 17, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Marty Robbins (host/performer), guest performer Jimmy C. Newman, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Shorty Lavender, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Minnie Pearl mentions an 8-page spread in ""this week's Life magazine"". Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Marty Robbins; Rod Brasfield; Jimmy C. Newman; Shorty Lavender; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Marty Robbins -- I Can't Quit (I've Gone Too Far) (Marty Robbins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Marty Robbins introduces Jimmy Newman -- Let The Whole World Talk (Jimmy C. Newman) -- Marty Robbins introduces Shorty Lavender -- Mississippi Sawyer (Shorty Lavender fiddle) -- Marty Robbins talks -- Who At My Door Is Standing (Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Marty Robbins) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Marty Robbins introduces Del Wood -- Crazy (Del Wood)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Wood, Del; Lavender, Shorty; Robbins, Marty; Newman, Jimmy C.
